name: Twitter RT Button Outlined
description: Make Twitter RT(Retweet) Button outlined for accessibility. special thanks to https://stackoverflow.com/a/18330345 Try other our userstyles for Twitter: - Pastel Color Twitter - Fast Twitter 2020
additional_info: 2020/7/18 add domain application section (it was global...) 2020/7/14 fix for full screened image view 2020/7/11 add support for dim & dark mode 2020/6/30 works better with Pastel Color Twitter userstyles 2020/06/20 initial release
